text: Aldo Nardi (3 March 1931 – 11 July 2001) was an Italian professional football player. He played for 6 seasons (80 games, 1 goal) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma, A.C. Torino and U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912. ==References== ==External links== Category:1931 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Empoli F.C. players Category:Torino F.C. players Category:U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912 players Category:F.C. Grosseto S.S.D. players Category:Association football defenders
title: Aldo Nardi
